0: Justin Bieber, who was stopped and cited Friday for driving in a "reckless manner" on an L.A. freeway, may have been chased by the paparazzi. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR CHP officers reported seeing at least one other car chasing Bieber, but that vehicle fled the scene when the singer was stopped. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Los Angeles City Councilman Dennis Zine, who called 911 to report the incident, said he saw paparazzi pursuing Bieber on the 101 Freeway in the San Fernando Valley.
